channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Amid The Genocide Of Nigerian Christians, Congress Must Act
item.description: To disregard the eradication of Christianity in Nigeria would embolden jihadists and signal that the blood of the martyrs means nothing to us.

item.title: Public Health Destroyed Its Own Credibility Long Before RFK Jr. Arrived
item.description: The American medical establishment ignored the science on Covid, abortion, and transgenderism. They have no credibility to criticize RFK Jr.

item.description: The White House revealed 49 migrants who committed crimes like murder, rape and assault who received Medicaid.

item.title: The Supreme Court Can Choose to Clarify Election Laws in Advance
